properties.areaDesc: Point Betsie to Sleeping Bear Point MI; Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI; Manistee to Point Betsie MI; Norwood MI to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge including Little Traverse Bay; Seul Choix Point to 5NM West of Mackinac Bridge; Grand Traverse Bay south of a line Grand Traverse Light to Norwood MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 2:51PM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 40 knots
expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
